forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 70F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 21C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Snow may mix in. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Snow may mix in. High near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later at night. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later at night. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy with snow showers around in the morning. High 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.
